products.title: Xerxes, Moss - Roman Blind
products.description: The lively, unusual imagery of the xerxes in moss truly does speak for itself. Intriguing camel images adorn a patterned green background, making this an eye-catching piece that's sure to get you and your guests talking at your next dinner party. Hung in the dining room, the moss will make a grand statement, and will look right at home amidst dark woods and classically shaped furniture. Include matching green as your base colour, but add the occasional rich red or purple to accent.

products.title: Fuji, Verdigris - Roman Blind
products.description: With its gorgeous green tones and tropical trees, the fuji verdigris is aptly named. Though the theme is tropical, the shades are muted, giving the blind a wonderfully understated feel that will work in any home. Hang the verdigris in the downstairs cloakroom or utility to give a dusky blast of colour where it's needed most. Surround with white walls, fittings, and furniture, and add the occasional green accessory to give depth and to bring out the colours in the blind.

products.title: Astral, Ivory - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at astral ivory and you come to appreciate the subtle way in which the leaves twist and turn across the fabric. They have an elegant and timeless feel to them - one which will add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. If you want to introduce a spark of creative inspiration to the dining room, combine ivory with some dark tableware and wall art to provide a strong contrast.

products.title: Astral, Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to reinvent your interiors and breathe new life into proceedings, your window spaces hold the key. Astral snow enables you to introduce a soft grey and a creamy base colour so that you have plenty of new creative avenues you could go down. It's all about simple neutral colours that subtly transform into one another when you want that relaxing homely vibe. Magnolia walls, a light stained wooden floor, and a few lamps rather than dazzling overhead lighting are all you really need to make things nice and cosy.

products.title: Astral, Jet - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of astral jet is that the neutral backdrop allows the florals to really come into their element. A crisp jet black can be hard to match to, but when it is as elegantly delivered as this, you won't be short of ways that you can make it work. Working in other patterning is a great way to turn the master bedroom into the room that allows you to rest and unwind at the end of a long day. A matching set of bed linen and some wall art opposite your windows would be worth a closer look.

products.title: Origin, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin cameo allows your eye to see something new the closer you study the care and craft that has gone into making it. A subtly patterned voile sits harmoniously with a finely detailed fabric that we call cameo. Far more than a walk on part, the unique vista design will allow your latest addition to take centre stage as it offers control of any room in the house as you effortlessly adjust the light.

products.title: Feather, Dess - Roman Blind
products.description: The feather in dess displays pretty feathers across a beautifully refreshing aqua turquoise background, resulting in a stunningly serene roman blind with bags of charm and plenty of personality. Use the dess to complement an ice white bathroom, opting for white in everything from your bathroom suite to your tiling and floor. Add in towels and accessories in matching aqua tones to keep the look fresh and coordinated, going for silver fixtures and fittings for a modern and contemporary feel.

products.title: Feather, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral patterning of the feather in dove showcases an understated style of dcor that will look at home in any kind of setting. Combining a pale creamy oatmeal background with a neutral grey for the illustrations, the look is subtle yet powerful. Surround the dove with alike cool neutrals, including soft cream walls, and pale grey tones to accentuate the light and airy look of the blind.

products.title: Morrison, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorn your home with sophisticated style by incorporating the morrison in duck egg, which showcases a contemporary, embellished design using silky thread for a glamourous silver shimmer, and in a majestic blue with stormy grey hues for a dramatic and eye-catching finish. Opt for a modern colour scheme in the bedroom by choosing dove grey walls as the base, and using matching duck eggs and slate greys in your soft furnishings and fabrics to bring out the hues in the duck egg.

products.title: Morrison, Rosso - Roman Blind
products.description: An attractive blind that creates a middle-ground for the traditional and the contemporary, the morrison in rosso blends a gorgeous mix of burnt orange, charcoal grey, and off-white in a pretty and unique pattern. Hang the neat folds of the rosso against a burnt orange feature wall for a bright and bold yet warm and welcoming ambience in your dining room. Surround with classic furniture in polished medium woods and traditional shapes, as well as plush soft furnishings for comfort.

products.title: Morrison, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In the morrison natural, a current and embellished design in silver-hued dove, slate, and charcoal greys, sits on a softer dusty background. The linen-look cloth with its silky thread hangs neatly into the flowing shape of the roman, giving a classical edge to this modern blind. Combine the contemporary pattern of the natural with similar arty fabrics and elegant stitchings to form a traditional style and, by continuing the stormy grey and charcoal hues in similarly toned fabrics, form a modish finish with soothing shades.

products.title: Camden, Pastel - Roman Blind
products.description: The moody, abstract blossoms of the camden pastel is offset by the bright and cheery colours it displays. Candy pinks, sunny yellows, and soft greens are just some of the pretty shades on offer, all with in natural tones to keep the look soft and subtle. Settle the sweet blossoms of the pastel in the kitchen, where happy colours are a must, and opt for oatmeal walls and apple green units for a country look.

products.title: Pavillion, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Keep up with the latest home dcor trends by including the pavillion in grey in your home. The fashionable grey and yellow colour pairing is both stylish and fun, and offers a serene look without compromising on colour. Hang the grey in your home study for a serious yet interesting look and feel. Opt for pale grey walls and accent throughout with charcoal greys and mustard yellows. Frame yellow and grey wall art in black, and go for modern, sleek furniture.

products.title: Pavillion, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: The pavillion in burnt orange combines a deep autumnal shade of orange with a more neutral charcoal grey, and the effect is both cosy and stylish. The somewhat geometric patterning offers a contemporary look that will work in any home. The burnt orange would be perfect for a warm and inviting den or sitting room area, where you can surround it with palest grey walls and deep shades of orange and grey in your furniture and soft furnishings.

products.title: Wind Dancer (Blackout), Marine - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new wind dancer blackout marine roller blind is the perfect way to add something playful to your home with the click of a button. The traditional way in which the design is layered allows you to add something that's a cross between retro and vintage. Creating a nautically themed nursery is the perfect way to welcome your new arrival to the family home. Take your time to get all of those small details right, and sleep easy safe in the knowledge that your window spaces are already spoken for.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: The floral stylings of summer trail blackout pastel allow you to lose yourself in the sounds and sites of spring no matter what time of year it is. Just what you need when you want to create that relaxing vibe you never want to leave. Matching to pastel is all about working in some lively colours like a mint green or a sunrise yellow. Use them on your minor surfaces such as lampshades and scatter cushions, and they'll work in perfect harmony with your light wooden floor and rich creamy walls.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Blossom - Roller Blind
products.description: Blossom is one of the latest additions to their summer trail blackout range, and it adds that sought after country aesthetic to any contemporary home. The intricacy of the florals allows you to lose yourself in the moment, whilst the subtle display of colour is perfect when you want to take your decor in multiple different directions. Think about ways to introduce coppers and slate greys into your space and you'll be rewarded with a contemporary look that has an ample helping of modern chic.

products.title: Floral (Blackout), Lilac - Roller Blind
products.description: Floral blackout lilac introduces your decor to a beautiful selection of colours that will catch the eye the moment you walk through the door. The way in which the lines ebb and flow gives it a life of its own, and allows you to lose yourself in the moment as you put your feet up for the evening. Rustic wooden furniture could just be the perfect addition to your new look living room, so why not browse and shop to see what's on offer? You never know, you might even be able to repurpose something you already have by working a little bit of that shabby chic magic.

products.title: Woodland, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: With a beautiful portfolio of natural greens, woodland fennel instantly transports you back to the simplicity and wonder of the outdoors. The tones and shapes really bring the fabric to life and sit gently in the background as they create a harmony with the rest of your space. Simple colours are what works best with fennel. A pale blue feature wall around your windows will work wonders when paired with some magnolia partner walls.

products.title: Woodland, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the gorgeously abstract blue tones of the misty woodland in saxon blue. The occasional sage green and pale dove grey is there to accent, and the imagery sits on a clean white background for contrast. Add the saxon blue to a downstairs cloakroom or utility to give the room a cool hue by painting the room a soft white and accessorising with blues and greens. To go along with the woodland theme, add some foliage or wildflower wall art to boot.

products.title: Woodland, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat folds that make the roman blind so special. Go for an autumn-themed living room by surrounding the auburn with similar green and brown colours in natural tones. Choose natural woods, jute rugs, and plenty of wools, accenting throughout with the occasional deep forest green and chocolate brown to add depth and interest.

products.title: Woodland, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Look closer and you'll see the artistry required to create each leafy branch as the fabric takes on a life of its own. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

products.title: Bougainvillea, Waterfall - Roman Blind
products.description: Delicate florals take centre stage in the elegant bougainvillea waterfall, a pretty piece in muted blues and fresh apple greens. An ivory background plays host to this array of foliage, and the outcome is one of freshness and serenity. Use the waterfall to pull together a light and airy living space, where pretty blue hues take centre stage. Alternatively, darken the room with a deep blue feature wall, allowing the blind to offset the colour beautifully.

products.title: Bougainvillea, Wisteria - Roman Blind
products.description: If gentle summer hues set your world on fire, then the bougainvillea wisteria will suit your home down to the ground. An ivory-white base is home to a pretty array of pretty lilacs and lavenders and hushed blues and greens, all in the form of gorgeously delicate florals and foliage. Hang the wisteria in the master bedroom, where it will get the full attention it so thoroughly deserves. Surround with similar shades of pink and purple, with the occasional accent in green thrown in for good measure.

products.title: Nightshade, Black - Day Night Blind
products.description: In stunning ebony, the nightshade in black is flawless in its appearance, offering just a hint of sheen on its pure black backdrop. Double layered fabric, thickly stitched to ensure extra light protection, hosts a translucent netting that can be adjusted to provide more or less light and privacy. Once you choose the black, you're choosing to make a statement, so why be shy with the colours? Use it in the dining room amidst pillar-box reds and pure whites for a committed contemporary scheme.

products.title: Nightshade, Chrome - Day Night Blind
products.description: In silky silver, the nightshade in chrome offers not only style but versatile practicality too. In between the cool grey, double layered fabric sit sliding translucent strips, which can be moved up and down to ensure flexible light control. Combine the chrome with a contemporary all-white kitchen, foregoing conventional colour and opting for a stark look full of clean lines and sharp metallics. Keep the base of the room white, and choose chrome fixtures, fittings, and appliances for a distinct and stunning aesthetic.

products.title: Nightshade, Brown Grain - Day Night Blind
products.description: Who knew that neat, intricate stitching could offer such a delightful wood look? The nightshade in brown grain does just that, with chocolate and taupe threads forming a textured aesthetic and working perfectly with the translucent netting that slides between them for flexible light and privacy. Due to the wood-effect fabric, the brown grain will match any number of dcor schemes. Why not embrace the brown and pair with matching chocolate tones and a vibrant lime green? This look would work fantastically in a garden-view living room to match the colours of the outdoors.

products.title: Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind
products.description: In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights. Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room.

products.title: Wonderland, Opal - Roman Blind
products.description: The antique feel of the wonderland range is ideal for those in love with the vintage look, and the opal offers a gorgeous palette of pinks, purples, oranges, and greys, all sat on an antique ivory base. Place the opal against soft grey walls in a master or guest bedroom, and carry the pretty purples or magentas through the room in the form of bedding, wall art, and the like. Go for brushed silver fixtures and fittings so as not to overwhelm the look with too much shine.

products.title: Wonderland, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous wonderland cream takes a rich cream background and charms it with pink and golden tones, leaving us with a beautifully antiqued look and feel to this roman blind. It's absolutely perfect for a home with a vintage style, whether traditional or contemporary. The cream will look fantastic in a master bedroom, placed amongst luxe creams and plush fabrics. Pick out the pink tone in the blind to use as an accent colour, keeping the remainder of the room neutral yet luxurious.

products.title: Burdock, Petrol - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the burdock in petrol is a stunning array of off-white burdock imagery, with a gorgeous background of inky petrol blues and jaded burnt oranges. This attractive roman blind has an abstract look to it that offers both contemporary and artistic styling. Hang the petrol in a cosy den or sitting room amidst fellow blues and whites, accented with sunny oranges for depth and character. Contemporary furniture will work wonderfully, as will dark polished woods - but always remember to add in plenty of lighter tones so as not to overdo it.

products.title: Burdock, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The burdock natural displays an earthy green canvas covered in fluffy white burdock flowers. Accenting colours include light aqua, deep lilac, and charcoal black, and the overall effect is moodily natural. Team the natural with a nature-inspired theme, where it will fit in perfectly. Include creamy whites, pale lilacs, and sweet aquas to lighten to look, and go for natural woods and perhaps some slate or other natural stones.

products.title: Burdock, Dandelion - Roman Blind
products.description: The burdock in dandelion certainly earns its name, showing deep dandelion yellows and oranges across a rich canvas of burdock imagery. The end result is a sunny and cheerful one, and hanging this blind in your home is sure to brighten up any room. Enhance a sunroom that catches the light by using the dandelion as a secondary source of sunny yellow. Keep surrounding walls pale, in off-white, ivory, or cream, and use either the yellow or orange tone from the blind to inspire your accessories throughout the rest of the room.

products.title: Leonardo, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Blending the fashionable colour combination of yellow and grey with a more traditional patterning, the leonardo in ochre makes a stunning feature. Deep charcoal and light silvery greys mix with a pale mustard tone, all on a soft white background, giving a contemporary twist to a conventional pattern. Hang the ochre in a grand dining room, alongside a traditional wooden dining table and chairs, and against a grey feature wall.

products.title: Leonardo, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The intricate, traditional patterning of the leonardo in dove is beautifully accentuated by the soft silver colouring. Ranging from barely there grey to gunmetal charcoal, the colour combination is just beautiful and, combined with the pretty stitching, makes quite a statement. Add the dove to your living room to create a truly luxurious look. Go for soft white walls and grey carpeting, and include silvery grey sofas and chairs.

products.title: Leonardo, Blush - Roman Blind
products.description: Blush pink, soft dove grey, and palest oatmeal combine beautifully to create the leonardo in blush. The intricate patterning and detailed stitching create a traditional effect and the overall look is one of understated grandness. The blush is perfect for a romantic and pretty look in a bedroom, and surrounding the blind with soft pinks and greys will give a serene and relaxing feel. Go for luxurious fabrics and pretty accessories to really accentuate the blind, keeping fixtures and fittings to a subtle brushed silver.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Magenta High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Magenta brings with it an electric dash of colour that fills your home with energy and style by reinventing the classic venetian blind by bringing it right up to date for the modern home. The high gloss finish shimmers in the light as you create a focal point that will attract the eye all day long. For a room that fills you with energy and puts a smile on your face partner magenta with little touches of other electric colours so that you can truly bring your home to life.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plum is the perfect deep relaxing colour for those looking to get away from it all once they get home. The soothing character of plum works in harmony with the high gloss finish to provide a crisp and clean aesthetic which allows you to make a feature of window spaces like never before. Add in blacks and whites to celebrate the extremes of the colour spectrum as your touch of plum sits handsomely in the middle taking pride of place as the focal point of your room.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: An enticing shade of red awaits every owner of this tried and trusted member of the kaleidoscope range. The high gloss finish gently shimmers in the light as the finely shaped wood takes pride of place in your home as it provides that modern reinterpretation of a timeless style. Scarlet allows you to be bold with your colour choices and let the gentle tones and colours in your room take a step back as you create a focal point.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light blues have a certain charm that other colours simply cannot match. They energise a room and allow you to weave otherwise contrasting colours into a coherent whole. Carmen takes the authentic touch of an inspiring blue and combines it with unrivalled craftsmanship and a spotless high gloss finish that gently shimmers in the light. Match carmen with some light beiges and sandy browns to evoke memories of time spent resting and relaxing along the coast.

products.title: Kensington, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The grey-toned navy blue that forms the background for the bold and vivacious kensington navy is rich and appealing, whilst the colours it boasts, in indigo, ocean, and petrol blues, plus varying shades of green, truly pop from the fabric. Hang the navy as part of a grand yet contemporary dining room, where darker woods rule and drama takes pride of place. Accent the room with matching aqua blues and hot fuchsia, using them to bring out the rich tones of the blind.

products.title: Kasian, Dess - Roman Blind
products.description: If you love abstract patterning in soft, relaxing colours, then the kasian in dess is for you. The pale aqua and mint tones in the blind will bring a sense of serenity and peace to any room in the home, working wonderfully as part of a contemporary setting. Create a harmonic look and feel in a home office by hanging the dess against soft off-white or eau de nil walls, giving you a pretty space to work in without bright or bold distractions.

products.title: Kensington, Mustard - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeously bold, and bang on trend, the kensington mustard is a real showstopper. A sunny-toned mustard background almost steals the show, except for its stunning display of brightly coloured florals, in pinks, blues, and greens. The mustard would look just ravishing in your living room, against palest grey walls and brightly coloured accessories. Go for either natural wooden flooring or a rich cream carpet with a plush feel, and opt for bold wall art - though nothing that could detract from the blind.

products.title: Nova, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: In vibrant, fruity green, the nova lime is a bold and dazzling piece that will liven up any room. The bright hue contrasts nicely with the softness of the texturing, making for a stylish and innovative blind. Inject a sense of fun into a child's bedroom by combining the lime with playful, illustrated wallpapers in complementary colours such as navy and cobalt blues or lemon yellows and zingy oranges.

products.title: Nova, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: Melding a deep, autumnal shade of orange with a soft, suede-like texturing and lined detailing, the nova in burnt orange is a striking yet versatile roman. The lightweight and agile fabric hangs neatly and elegantly, making this a pleasant blind to handle, as well as look at. Give your home office a seasonal burst of colour by including the burnt orange and surrounding it with soft oatmeals and light taupes.

products.title: Nova, Ebony - Roman Blind
products.description: In muted jet black, the nova ebony has a classically chic feel, adding to by the delicate zigzag texturing of the moccasin-like fabric. The cloth is easy and soft, blending perfectly into the effortless folds of the roman. Craft a cool and trendy ambience in a teenager's bedroom by including the ebony amongst neon shades of pink, lime, yellow, or orange, or any combination of those shades if you're feeling extra brave.

products.title: Nova, Damson - Roman Blind
products.description: In rich, plummy purple, the nova damson presents a flawlessly soft fabric, with a gentle suede-esque feel, embossed with subtle, zigzag stripes that add character and depth more than an obvious pattern. Craft yourself a dramatic dining room by combining the damson with dark woods and glossy silvers. Include a chandelier-style light fitting for extra glamour, and use silvers to frame plum-toned wall art, being sure to also match cushions and table linen to the decor scheme.

products.title: Nova, Grape - Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and moody, the nova grape is an attractively unusual shade of aubergine purple, and further character is added by the soft, suede-feel fabric and its barely-there zigzag patterning. The supple cloth crimps effortlessly into the puckers of the roman, forming a luxe and stylish blind. Glam up your master bedroom by combining the grape with shades of silver and soft grey. Go for palest grey walls and match your bedlinen to the blind, then accessorise with silver throws, cushions, frames, and ornaments for a dark and striking design.

products.title: Nova, Orion - Roman Blind
products.description: In a hushed midnight blue, the nova's orion is an attractive and dusky shade, and encompasses the idea of understated luxury with its soft and supple, suede-feel fabric. The overall look is unusual, stylish, and chic, fitting in perfectly with the handsome roman style. Adopt a blue and white colour scheme in your home office, featuring the orion as your key focal point. Paint the walls in a pure white, and opt for matching white fabrics throughout the room.
